app_detail:
Spin The Bottle is an awesome party and drinking game to play with friends before a night out. The game plays much like the classic truth or dare. Ready to get drunk? Spin the bottle, do dares, tell truths and get the party started. Drink responsibly â¤ï¸

If you just want to have fun, play casual mode. If you want to party hard try the party mode. Want to get dirty? Dirty mode contains sexy and kinky questions together with extreme and naughty dares.
